markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Warding Rune](/Feats.aspx?ID=915) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 119 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Runescarred](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=21)

**Prerequisites**
[Runescarred Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=912)

</column>

---

Your runes provide a warding effect that protects you against a specific school of magic. Choose a school of magic other than divination. You gain a rune on your body corresponding to that school, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to all saving throws against effects of that school.
name: Warding Rune
